instruction: Summarize the article "The Benefits of Working from Home" in 5 sentences.
output: Working from home provides many benefits, including improved job satisfaction and reduced stress levels. It can also lead to greater productivity and higher quality of work, since there are no distractions. Additionally, it can provide flexibility in working hours, allowing for better work-life balance and more time for family. Finally, it can save costs for both the employee and the employer. In short, working from home can bring numerous advantages to both employer and employee.
